context: Moving into a real downtown apartment. Two rooms, neon views, arriving in life.

lines.text: First night in a place with two rooms. You open both doors just because you can.
The living room faces the street. Through the window, neon signs pulse â€” a bar called AFTER HOURS bathes your ceiling in hot pink every three seconds.
The parking garage underneath has space for three cars. Three. You remember when you didn't have one that ran.
You stand at the window and watch the city you're learning to own. A text comes through.

lines.speaker: maya
lines.text: Heard you upgraded. Fancy. Don't forget where you came from.
You look at the neon. Pink. Blue. Pink again.
You couldn't forget if you tried.
